frameset.edef: claiming relationship, joining/ entering in a group

example.parse: (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أكد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_ACC المتهمين)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MD اعترفا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب_) (S-NOM (PUNC ") (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN انتساب) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3D هما)) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تنظيم) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN القاعدة))))))
